data.title: Contact Us — Law Foundation of Silicon Valley
data.text:
Need help? Contact Us

Call us, submit an online form, or send us a message online using the form below. Assistance is available in many languages. | Asistencia disponible en varios idiomas. | Dịch vụ có thể dùng dưới nhiều ngôn ngữ khác.

Housing | Vivienda | Chương trình Nhà ở: (408) 280-2424

WALK-IN HOURS: Closed effectively

PHONE INTAKE HOURS: Monday, 9 AM - 11:30 AM

Children & Youth | Niños y jóvenes | Chương trình cho Trẻ em: (408) 280-2416

WALK-IN HOURS: None, By Appointment Only

PHONE INTAKE HOURS: Monday - Friday; 9 AM - 12 PM & 1 PM – 4 PM

Health/Mental Health | Salud/Salud mental | Chương trình Sức khỏe tâm thần: (408) 280-2420

WALK-IN HOURS: Tuesdays & Thursdays; 1 PM - 3 PM

PHONE INTAKE HOURS: Monday - Friday; 1 PM – 4 PM

Visit us: 4 North Second Street, Suite 1300, San Jose, CA 95113

For general questions, please call (408) 293-4790

Fax: (408) 293-0106

We help residents of Silicon Valley with civil legal problems. We do not provide help with criminal matters. For assistance with a criminal matter, contact your local Public Defender’s office.

Please note that the Law Foundation has limited staff and resources to serve clients. Unfortunately, we cannot represent every client who has a meritorious legal case. The delivery of services in a priority case will be dependent upon case acceptance guidelines, the availability of services from other sources, financial resources and available staff, which may vary from time to time.

Please contact us to find out if we can help you. If we are unable to help you, we may be able to suggest other useful resources.

ESPAÑOL

Si necesita ayuda con sus asuntos legales civiles, por favor póngase en contacto con nosotros por teléfono, (408) 293-4790, oa través de nuestro formulario de correo electrónico. Nuestro personal bilingüe le ayudará a comunicarse con el programa adecuado.

Tenga en cuenta que no tomamos todos los casos, nuestro personal le hará preguntas para ver si se trata de una cuestión con cual le podemos ayudar o lo referiran a otra organización que si le podra ayudar con su asunto.
